alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Davidson; Marshall; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Davidson, northeastern Marshall, Rutherford, eastern Williamson and northern Bedford Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Nolensville to Eagleville. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Shelbyville, Smyrna, La Vergne, Nolensville, Walterhill, Chapel Hill, Wartrace, Eagleville, Bell Buckle, Normandy, Lascassas, Christiana, Fosterville, Triune, Rover, Deason, Rockvale and Unionville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 62 and 95. Interstate 840 between mile markers 39 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
